:::: {.body-text-s .vertical-center}

- **Autocrine signalling**: induce a cellular response within the same cell. 

- **Paracrine signalling**: diffusion of signalling, secreted molecules in the external medium.

- **Juxtacrine signalling**: contact-dependant, through gap junctions or membrane nanotubes.

- **Endocrine signalling**: long-range intercellular communication enabled by blood-circulating hormones.
